jaxbody_idle_groan.text: *low ghoul groan, confused but not hostile*

jaxbody_memory_echo_01.text: *a broken whisper escapes the ruined throat: '...dad...' *

jaxbody_memory_echo_02.text: *a rasping exhale, almost forming the word '...home...' *

jaxbody_recoil_overseer_voice.text: *the body jerks violently, as if hearing its own voice from far away*

jaxbody_touch_reaction.text: *flinches, then relaxes slightly, confused by the contact*

jaxbody_finalA_peace.text: *the body exhales softly, tension fading, a final calm settling in*

jaxbody_finalB_wander.text: *the body turns away, limping into the wasteland with a hollow, distant groan*

jaxbody_finalC_sync.text: *the body reaches toward the terminal voice, a broken sound escaping: '...me...' *
